main event: Multiple witnesses observed unidentified objects in the sky over Saratoga Springs, New York, on September 16, 1959.
interesting points: The objects were described as irregular in shape and the size of the planet Mars,Lighting effects were visible, but did not appear to be reflections,The objects were seen descending below the horizon,The sightings involved reports of bright bluish lights and a bright red color,The observers noted that the objects seemed to zigzag while accelerating.
witness description: MccConnell and family were in an automobile with various plants when they noticed the objects in the sky.
